headline: Assessing Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) Valuation As AI Lumber Scanning Deal Highlights Automation Potential
summary: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) is back in focus after EBI Electric adopted its AltiZ 3D sensors to power a new AI-driven lumber scanning system, aiming to improve measurement precision and cut costly wood waste. See our latest analysis for Zebra Technologies. Despite the AI and machine vision headlines, Zebra Technologies' recent share price performance has been weak. A 7 day share price return of 12.31% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 28.91% point to fading momentum over both shorter and...
